verses.verse: Now the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> propound <S%H2330><s%> a riddle, <S%H2420><s%> and speak <S%H9301><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "A great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings, <S%H3671><s%> long <S%H750><s%> pinions <S%H83><s%> and a full <S%H4392><s%> plumage <S%H5133><s%> of many <S%H7553><s%> colors, <S%H7553><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> away the top <S%H6788><s%> of the cedar. <S%H730><s%>

"He plucked <S%H6998><s%> off <S%H6998><s%> the topmost <S%H7218><s%> of its young <S%H3242><s%> twigs <S%H3242><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it to a land <S%H776><s%> of merchants; <S%H9211><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> it in a city <S%H5892><s%> of traders. <S%H7402><s%>

"He also took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> and planted <S%H5414><s%> it in fertile <S%H2233><s%> soil. <S%H7704><s%> He placed <S%H3947><s%> [it] beside <S%H5921><s%> abundant <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> it [like] a willow. <S%H6851><s%>

"Then it sprouted <S%H6779><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> a low, <S%H8217><s%> spreading <S%H5628><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> with its branches <S%H1808><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> him, but its roots <S%H8328><s%> remained <S%H1961><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it. So it became <S%H1961><s%> a vine, <S%H1612><s%> and yielded <S%H6213><s%> shoots <S%H909><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> out branches. <S%H6288><s%>

"But there was another <S%H259><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> plumage; <S%H5133><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> bent <S%H3719><s%> its roots <S%H8328><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> him and sent <S%H7971><s%> out its branches <S%H1808><s%> toward him from the beds <S%H6170><s%> where <S%H4302><s%> it was planted, <S%H4302><s%> that he might water <S%H8248><s%> it.

"It was planted <S%H8362><s%> in good <S%H2896><s%> soil <S%H7704><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> abundant <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> that it might yield <S%H6213><s%> branches <S%H6057><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> [and] become <S%H1961><s%> a splendid <S%H155><s%> vine. <S%H1612><s%>"'

"Say, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Will it thrive <S%H6743><s%>? Will he not pull <S%H5423><s%> up its roots <S%H8328><s%> and cut <S%H7082><s%> off <S%H7082><s%> its fruit, <S%H6529><s%> so that it withers <S%H3001><s%> – so that all <S%H3605><s%> its sprouting <S%H6780><s%> leaves <S%H2964><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%>? And neither <S%H3808><s%> by great <S%H1419><s%> strength <S%H2220><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> by many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> can it be raised <S%H5375><s%> from its roots <S%H8328><s%> [again.]

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> though it is planted, <S%H8362><s%> will it thrive <S%H6743><s%>? Will it not completely <S%H3001><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%> as soon as the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> strikes <S%H5060><s%> it – wither <S%H3001><s%> on the beds <S%H6170><s%> where <S%H6780><s%> it grew <S%H6780><s%>?"' "
Moreover, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Say <S%H559><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> 'Do you not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> [mean?'] Say, <S%H559><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> its king <S%H4428><s%> and princes, <S%H8269><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to him in Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

'And he took <S%H3947><s%> one of the royal <S%H4410><s%> family <S%H2233><s%> and made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him, putting <S%H935><s%> him under oath. <S%H423><s%> He also took <S%H3947><s%> away the mighty <S%H9012><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%>
that the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> might be in subjection, <S%H8217><s%> not exalting <S%H5375><s%> itself, [but] keeping <S%H8104><s%> his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> that it might continue. <S%H5975><s%>

'But he rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against him by sending <S%H7971><s%> his envoys <S%H4397><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that they might give <S%H5414><s%> him horses <S%H5483><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> troops. <S%H5971><s%> Will he succeed <S%H6743><s%>? Will he who does <S%H6213><s%> such <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> escape <S%H4422><s%>? Can he indeed break <S%H6565><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> and escape <S%H4422><s%>?

'As I live, <S%H2416><s%>' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the country <S%H4725><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> who put <S%H4427><s%> him on the throne, <S%H4427><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> oath <S%H423><s%> he despised, <S%H959><s%> and whose <S%H834><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> he broke, <S%H6565><s%> in Babylon <S%H894><s%> he shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

'And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> with [his] mighty <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> will not help <S%H6213><s%> him in the war, <S%H4421><s%> when they cast <S%H8210><s%> up mounds <S%H5550><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> siege <S%H1785><s%> walls <S%H1785><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> lives. <S%H5315><s%>

'Now he despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> by breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he pledged <S%H5414><s%> his allegiance, <S%H3027><s%> yet did <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things; <S%H428><s%> he shall not escape. <S%H4422><s%>' "

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "As I live, <S%H2416><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> My oath <S%H423><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he despised <S%H959><s%> and My covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he broke, <S%H6565><s%> I will inflict <S%H5414><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>

"And I will spread <S%H6566><s%> My net <S%H7568><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> him, and he will be caught <S%H8610><s%> in My snare. <S%H9287><s%> Then I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%> and enter <S%H8199><s%> into judgment <S%H8199><s%> with him there <S%H8033><s%> [regarding] the unfaithful <S%H4604><s%> act <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has committed <S%H4603><s%> against Me.

"And all <S%H3605><s%> the choice <S%H4005><s%> men <S%H4005><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> his troops <S%H102><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the survivors <S%H7604><s%> will be scattered <S%H6566><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> wind; <S%H7307><s%> and you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"

Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "I shall also take <S%H3947><s%> [a sprig] from the lofty <S%H7311><s%> top <S%H6788><s%> of the cedar <S%H730><s%> and set <S%H5414><s%> [it] out; I shall pluck <S%H6998><s%> from the topmost <S%H7218><s%> of its young <S%H3127><s%> twigs <S%H3127><s%> a tender <S%H7390><s%> one, <S%H7390><s%> and I shall plant <S%H8362><s%> [it] on a high <S%H1364><s%> and lofty <S%H9642><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"On the high <S%H4791><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> I shall plant <S%H8362><s%> it, that it may bring <S%H5375><s%> forth <S%H5375><s%> boughs <S%H6057><s%> and bear <S%H6213><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and become <S%H1961><s%> a stately <S%H117><s%> cedar. <S%H730><s%> And birds <S%H6833><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> kind <S%H3671><s%> will nest <S%H7931><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> it; they will nest <S%H7931><s%> in the shade <S%H6738><s%> of its branches. <S%H1808><s%>

"And all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> I bring <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> exalt <S%H1361><s%> the low <S%H8217><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> dry <S%H3002><s%> up the green <S%H3892><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and make the dry <S%H3001><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> flourish. <S%H6524><s%> I am the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> I have spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and I will perform <S%H6213><s%> [it.]"
